# September 8, 2018
```{r setup, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
library(dplyr)

statelocations.df <- read.csv("statelocations.csv")

map <- leaflet(width = 900) %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(lat = statelocations.df$lat, lng = statelocations.df$lng, popup = statelocations.df$State)

map
```
